org.apache.juneau.http

Class HeaderString

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.http.HeaderString
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AcceptRanges, Authorization, CacheControl, Connection, ContentRange, ETag, Expect, From, Host, IfRange, Pragma, ProxyAuthenticate, ProxyAuthorization, Range, RetryAfter, Server, Trailer, TransferEncoding, UserAgent, Vary, Warning, WwwAuthenticate

    public class HeaderString
extends Object
    Category of headers that consist of a single string value.

    Example

    Accept-Ranges: bytes

    See Also:
    • Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1
